com.vernalis.pdbconnector.config
Class PdbConnectorConfig

java.lang.Object
  com.vernalis.pdbconnector.config.PdbConnectorConfig

public class PdbConnectorConfig
extends java.lang.Object

Manages the dialog options for PDB Connector KNIME Node.

Singleton class to define the query and report options presented in PdbConnectorNodeDialog and used by PdbConnectorNodeModel. The configuration is loaded dynamically from an external xml/PdbConnectorConfig.xml/dtd file at run time, to allow for updates to the supported PDB query and report options without the need for code modification.

Author:
dmorley
See Also:
PdbConnectorNodeDialog, PdbConnectorNodeModel

getInstance

getQueryCategories

public final java.util.List<QueryCategory> getQueryCategories()
Gets the query categories. Each QueryCategory contains a collection of related QueryOption objects, and is displayed on a single named tab of the node dialog.

Returns:
the query categories
See Also:
QueryOption

getReportCategories

public final java.util.List<ReportCategory> getReportCategories()
Gets the report categories. Each ReportCategory contains a collection of related ReportField objects and is displayed on a single named subpanel of the node Report Options dialog tab. Report categories are useful in the Customizable Table report dialog to facilitate selection (or deselection) of all report fields in that category.

Returns:
the report categories
See Also:
ReportField, StandardReport, StandardCategory

getStandardCategories

public final java.util.List<StandardCategory> getStandardCategories()
Gets the standard categories. Each StandardCategory contains a collection of related StandardReport objects and represents a heading in the Select Report dropdown of the Report Options dialog tab. Note that a StandardReport (for example Ligand) may not select all of the report fields in the ReportCategory of the same name, and may include fields from other report categories.

Returns:
the standard categories
